alert.note: Alert for Linn (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 12 at 10:14PM CDT until July 12 at 10:45PM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pleasant Hill has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Linn County in east central Kansas... * Until 1045 PM CDT. * At 1013 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Blue Mound, or 10 miles southwest of Mound City, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Mound City, Blue Mound and Prescott. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
